content: {"name": "New York City Relief,  LOWER EAST SIDE OUTREACH", "alternate_name": "", "description": " Located BTWN CHRYSTIE & FORSYTH ST\n\nThis location has: Soup, bread, beverages, socks, hygiene kits, prayer, & Life Care Visits (ie: one-on-one referrals to resources.)", "email": "", "url": "https://cityrelief.org/our-locations", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "Delancey Street", "address_2": null, "city": "New York", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10002", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.7201909, "longitude": -73.993341}, "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "No food distribution - marked unavailable"}]}
